alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Eastern San Miguel County; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 28 at 1:45AM MST until November 29 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, West Central Mountains, Southwest Mountains, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Central Highlands, Northeast Highlands, Eastern San Miguel County, Guadalupe County, and Quay County. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Eastern San Miguel County; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southwest Mountains; West Central Mountains
